interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
Review Date: 2021/10/14
Store: RATED GREEN
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Review Text: Used this for a few treatments, what I notice, my scalp is softer and  my hair has some more moisture and a little more volume and looks healthier, Didn't notice a difference with flakes or dandruff( but I really only have issues with this in the colder months) .  I like that its all natural, less chemicals the better for my hair.
Review Title: does moisturize
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Rated Green - Hibiscus Moisturizing Scalp Pack - Tube - 6.76 fl. oz. Cold Brewed Organic Hibiscus with Natural Honey - Softening Hair Mask for Women & Men
RATED GREEN
{'Brand': 'RATED GREEN', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Product Dimensions': '19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches; 7.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RGNOP2'}
Used my regular shampoo, then followed up with this hair mask. Left it on for 5 mins and brushed it through my hair with a comb in the shower. The smell is amazing( if you like bananas, which I do ) After washing I let my hair air dry and my hair is so smooth and soft. I also have a nice shine to my hair. I notice with this product a little goes a long way so one bottle can last a while. Never used a hair mask before and I really like the life it gave my hair back.  I will continue to use this 1-2 times a week.
Amazing soft smooth hair after use
Utrue 2PCS Rhinestone Headbands（random color）
Utrue

I have to say these are really nice headbands and very well made. The stones sparkle. Now this could just be preference, I don't like how bulky they are and how much they pop up on my head. Thats why I gave them 4 stars. They are comfortable and you can wear all day without getting a headache!
Really well made.. buttt

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to favor hair care products, particularly moisturizing treatments, and demonstrates ongoing interest in fashion accessories like headbands.
- **Ingredients:** Strong preference for organic and natural formulations in hair care, reflecting a health-conscious lifestyle. Recent purchase reinforces the commitment to products with minimal chemicals.
- **Perfume Sensitivity:** Enjoys pleasant scents, especially fruity aromas, and values aesthetic elements such as sparkle in accessories.
- **Hair Type Focus:** Focuses on products suitable for fine hair, seeking enhancements in softness, moisture, and overall hair health while prioritizing comfort in headwear.
- **Usage Pattern:** Maintains a routine usage pattern for hair care products, incorporating a new moisturizing treatment into a regular regimen and considering accessory usage as complementary.
- **Application Method:** Prefers simple and effective application processes for hair care products and values comfort in accessories for all-day wear.
- **Value for Money:** Appreciates cost-effectiveness and product longevity, emphasizing that a little product goes a long way, while also valuing quality in fashion accessories.
- **Feedback Behavior:** Actively provides feedback based on satisfaction, giving high ratings for effective products and sharing observations on performance, particularly related to moisture and overall effectiveness.

Overall, the user displays a clear trend toward effective, high-quality hair care solutions and aesthetically appealing accessories that prioritize natural ingredients, comfort, and practical value.
